case.state: Hi, I'm Tifa! Let's make this a night to remember.
Hi, I'm Tifa! Let's make this a night to remember.

I'll take ~cards~.
I'm gonna win!
Oh, these are nice.
Awesome!
Hah! The girls are staying put for now.
Hah! I'm not stripping down yet.
Well, these should save me for now.
Yeah! I'm staying here at least a little bit longer.
Here goes!
Time to get serious!
Calm down...deep breaths.
I guess these might work.
I have to hope these are good enough... but my luck hasn't been the best tonight.
I can't get timid now.
I... I hope these cards are enough.
I just have to hope that these cards are enough.
Please be enough...
Oh no...
These are bad.

I'm not the one who's supposed to be getting naked...

Oh, come on! How can I be losing again?
How can I still be losing?
What? I lost? But you're all still clothed...
No! How can I have lost again?
I'm starting with my ~clothing~.
Now it's time to take my ~clothing~ off.
I'm taking off my ~clothing~.
I have to take off my ~clothing~.
So I... I have to take off my ~clothing~. I know you've been staring at them all night.

I can't believe I'm doing this.
Sorry to disappoint you.
Still nothing special.
Don't touch the materia in there.
I don't have much left.

And I don't expect that to change.
I thought I'd get to watch someone else tonight...
So, what are you taking off, ~name~?

Come on.
Ohh... Just that?
You've still got your ~clothing~ left to take off?
But I know you've got something good under there waiting for us.
It's what most people would do in your situation.
They can't protect you forever.
I'm sure you have something better than that.

So what are you packing in there?
Well, what have you got for us tonight?
So... what did you bring to show and tell?

A fun little toy.

Aw, that's a toy I could play with...

Did you socket some materia in there?

Well... Hello to you too, fella.

Oh wow... That thing could fit all the way between my boobs.

Wow... Wanna see if it'll fit through my... hah... my tits?

Time to show us how you work it, ~name~.

Time to put on a show.
